import react, {useState} from 'react'; import '../ImageLinkForm.css'; import Modal from 'react-modal' ; const customStyles = { content : { top : '50%', left : '50%', right : 'auto', bottom : 'auto', marginRight : '-50%', transform : 'translate(-50%, -50%)' } }; // Make sure to bind modal to your appElement (http://reactcommunity.org/react-modal/accessibility/) Modal.setAppElement(document.getElementById('root')); const ModifyUser = ({user, toggle}) =>{ var subtitle; const [modalIsOpen, setModalIsOpen] = useState(false); const [modalEmail, setModalEmail] = useState(false); const [modalPassword, setModalPassword] = useState(false); const openModalUsername = () =>{ setModalIsOpen(true); } const openModalEmail = () =>{ setModalEmail(true); } const openModalPassword = () =>{ setModalPassword(true); } const afterOpenModal = () => { // references are now sync'd and can be accessed. subtitle.style.color = '#f00'; } const closeModalUsername = () =>{ setModalIsOpen(false); } const closeModalEmail = () =>{ setModalEmail(false); } const closeModalPassword = () =>{ setModalPassword(false); } return(

User Informations

Current Username:

{user.name}

(subtitle = _subtitle)}>Hello

Change Username

Current Email:

{user.email}

(subtitle = _subtitle)}>Hello

Change Email

Joined:

{user.joined}

(subtitle = _subtitle)}>Hello

Change Password
); } export default ModifyUser; /*

Current Username: {user.name}

Current Email: {user.email}

Joined on: {user.joined}

Change Password
